q1_text: In the past 2 weeks, which of these have you experienced?
q2_text: How much do these affect your daily life?
q3_text: Have you thought about hurting yourself?
symptom_2: Little interest in things you enjoy
symptom_10: Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much
symptom_11: Can't sit still or restless energy
symptom_12: Forget things or lose track easily
harm_3: Yes, and I have a plan
msg_moderate: You seem to be carrying a heavy emotional load.
msg_significant: Your symptoms suggest you might be facing significant challenges.
not_alone_msg: You are not alone. Help is available
safe_yes_btn: Yes, I'm safe â€“ Connect me to a counselor
safe_no_btn: No, I need help now â€“ Call 112
safe_response: Great. Please stay on the line or visit the nearest hospital. We recommend calling Tele-MANAS immediately for a safe conversation.
runner_complete_msg: Thank you for completing the session. Your responses have been saved.
runner_alert_answer: Please answer this question to proceed.
session_phq_9_assessment_desc: A standard screening tool to assess severity of depressive symptoms.
q_phq_q1_text: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by having little interest or pleasure in doing things?
q_phq_q2_text: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
q_phq_q3_text: On a scale of 1â€“10, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
q_phq_q4_text: Which of the following symptoms have you experienced recently? (Select all that apply)
q_phq_q5_text: Please describe any specific thoughts or situations that have been bothering you recently.
opt_energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
session_gad_7_assessment_desc: Screening for Generalized Anxiety Disorder and panic symptoms.
q_gad_q1_text: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
q_gad_q2_text: Have you experienced a sudden panic attack (intense fear/discomfort) in the last week?
q_gad_q3_text: Describe the situation where the panic attack occurred. What were you thinking at that moment?
q_gad_q4_text: Which of the following physical symptoms do you experience when anxious? (Select all that apply)
q_gad_q5_text: What strategies have you tried to manage your worry so far?
session_stress_coping_assessment_desc: Evaluate your current stress levels and support system.
q_stress_q1_text: Rate your overall stress level today.
q_stress_q2_text: Identify your primary sources of stress right now. (Select all that apply)
q_stress_q3_text: Do you feel you have adequate support to handle these stressors?
q_stress_q4_text: What is one small thing you can do today to reduce this stress?
opt_strong: Yes, I have a strong support system
opt_some: I have some support but could use more
opt_none: No, I feel I am handling this alone
session_full_health_assessment_desc: A comprehensive check-in to understand your emotional well-being.
q_f_q1_text: Over the last 2 weeks, have you been feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?
q_f_q2_text: Have you not been able to stop or control worrying?
q_f_q3_text: Have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?
q_f_q4_text: How would you rate your overall stress level today?
q_f_q5_text: Is there anything specific causing you stress right now?
